page.title: 04Domesday Book Continued
page.content: Stoke Pero Roger of Courseulles holds STOKE PERO himself. Aihilla held it before 1066; It paid tax for \ virgate of land.Land for 2 ploughs.1 plough there,with 1 slave+ 2 smallholders. Pasture,50 acres;woodland,60 acres .5 cattle;7 pigs;20 sheep;20 goats. The value was and is 5's. Wilmersham Drogo holds Wilmersham from the bishop of Coutances.Before 1066 it paid tax for 1 hide and 1 virgate of land.Land for 5 ploughs,of which three virgates are in lordship;1 plough's there;3 slaves;5 villagers and 3 smallholdres with 1 plough and 3 virgates. Pasture,200 acres;woodland,as much.5 cattle;40 sheep;30 goats. Value 30's.
